import sys

# read input
N, M, Q = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

# initialize
a = [[0 for _ in range(M)] for _ in range(N)]

# read input
for _ in range(Q):
    ai, bi, ci, di = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    a[bi-1][ci] += di
    if ai > 1:
        a[ai-2][ci] -= di

# calculate
for i in range(N):
    for j in range(M):
        if i > 0:
            a[i][j] += a[i-1][j]

# print
print(max(a[N-1]))

# N, M, Q = map(int, input().split())
# a, b, c, d = [], [], [], []
# for i in range(Q):
#     a_i, b_i, c_i, d_i = map(int, input().split())
#     a.append(a_i)
#     b.append(b_i)
#     c.append(c_i)
#     d.append(d_i)

N, M, Q = 3, 4, 3
a = [1, 1, 2]
b = [3, 2, 3]
c = [3, 2, 2]
d = [100, 10, 10]

# dp[i][j] = i番目までのクエリを見て、jを作るときの最大値
dp = [[0 for _ in range(M+1)] for _ in range(N+1)]

for i in range(Q):
    for j in range(M+1):
        if j - c[i] >= 0:
            dp[b[i]][j] = max(dp[b[i]][j], dp[a[i]][j-c[i]] + d[i])

print(max(dp[N]))
